trackinfo.title: No necesito terapia, necesito una dictadura del proletariado
El término correcto no es 'inflación' si no 'estafa'
Fantasías soviéticas de ayer y hoy
Una profunda desconfianza hacia la noción de neutralidad
Plegarias por el pronto deceso de Patricia Bullrich
Recetas fáciles y económicas para cocinar millonarios
Historias sobre superioridad y el mito del trabajo duro

Cheating Spouses Caught On Tape.title: Resting Bitch Face
Cheating Spouses Caught On Tape.about: Songs for a gray landscape

trackinfo.title: Made Up Confessions
trackinfo.lyrics:
Let me know if you are going
‘Cause I don’t know

Is it somewhere worth exploring?
Yeah, I don’t care

Give the altar what it wants
It could take a few years
But you won’t be naked
Anymore
Well, they say you look so dumb
Throwing shade just like a star
And I just wonder how to wake up
With a different set of lies

I don’t know you, stop talking
Who writes these things anyway?
I’m begging, please stop talking
I think I’m in the wrong play

trackinfo.title: Butterfly on the Windshield
trackinfo.lyrics:
Stretch the limbs
Crawl out of the slimy womb
Legs so fierce
Wings that’ll take you anywhere

So fast, so sweet
The trip that just begins
So strong and free
A rabid pack of dreams
So fast, they sink
While time it moves so weird
Am I the butterfly on the windshield?

Eyes on the road
Overwhelmed by light and noise
Smell and taste
Ants burning under the sun

trackinfo.title: Citizen Neighbour
trackinfo.lyrics:
How your eyes jump scanning 
Almost like a Terminator
The overzealous tone in which you ask
“Where are you going?”

And it’s kind of strange that you don’t feel
Like an asshole most of the time
Uptight to the unseen
And always ready for a petty fight

This frantic need for explanations
You’re a sucker for an interrogation

Charred tongue
Blind to taste
Blistered fingertips
Sweetness dimmed

trackinfo.title: The Impossible Life
trackinfo.lyrics:
It all started
With a low rumbling drone
On the right ear

Then words became
A different kind of noise

The walls behind
Took a deeper shade of white
And it was clear
From this view
It wasn’t a fair trade

It all started
With a high-pitched buzzing
On the left ear

The shakings began
In waves of sweat and noise

The walls behind
Couldn’t hide the simple fact
And as we speak
It’s still unclear
Was it worth the price?

Coerced cooperation
Choose between gold or sanity
Opposite trajectories
Swimming in the same pool of defeat

Are you doing ok?
Lately you been fading in the background
Head full of regret
And the sweet promise of sleep

trackinfo.title: Noise
trackinfo.lyrics:
You must be careful
Don’t trust these eyes
‘Cause when the lights go down
You’re left with noise

Only noise

I’ve seen the error
We won’t survive
And when the chanting stops
It’ll be just noise

Just noise

What did we miss?
Was that our fault?
The ancient fear
The useless noise

Pointless noise

trackinfo.title: Self-Fulfilling Prophecy
trackinfo.lyrics:
An angel came to him in visions of regret
And wiped the tears from his face
It said: “Son, you’re the one, don’t let them trump your ways”
Anointed child of righteous rage

Resentful witness
You took the arrow
Right in your chest
They didn’t realize
The burning torsos and the stench
Or did they?

The words fell down like bullets, a holy storm of lead
The faces almost looked the same
The angel disappeared, horizon burning red
Foreshadowing the final days

A self-fulfilling prophecy
Is that the best that we can be?
Angel sit and talk to me
I’m starting to doubt that you are real

trackinfo.title: Too Colorful for Words
trackinfo.lyrics:
Past and present tense
All the inside jokes
What was written on the wall
Was kind of a hoax

And I don’t remember signing up
As the unwanted mirror
Or did I became so colorful?
With the perfect timing to ignore
This bitter revelation:
I’m as colorful as you

And through the waves of nothingness
When the nodding got too intense
And every single thought we had was lit
Yet we weren’t even there

Just too colorful for words

trackinfo.title: Surplus Issues
trackinfo.lyrics:
Nearly half of his life savings have vanished in a matter of months
The result is a population under constant economic pressure
Depression, anxiety and social isolation

trackinfo.title: My Love Song Went Wrong
trackinfo.lyrics:
Chemicals bursting
Dark lights flashing underneath
Are they running out of
Viable links to build?

And it’s nothing more
Than the gathered dust
On the corners of this scene
That’s breaking apart

You say the words
And I’ll just fight against my will
Or we could leave it at that
Just like we always did

Fixed with teeth

-Field recordings of insects

-Drills

-Dogs barking 

-Electric Guitars

-Acoustic Guitar 

-Synthesizer

-Violin

-Saxophone

-Piano

-Bass Drum

-Screwdriver

-Hammer

-Glass

-Ashtray

-Scissors

-Random metal objects

-Various pieces of furniture

-Unauthorized samples.

trackinfo.title: Stupid and Contagious
trackinfo.lyrics:
I'm glad you couldn't make it
We didn't miss you at all
Oh, please don't take it personal
You're just outgrown clothes

This space, it looks so empty
Let's cover up the walls
You know we're all just human
And the party's just begun

And we're here to sing
We're here to dance
We're more than enough
And we will never die

trackinfo.title: A Higher Art
trackinfo.lyrics:
This was the best that we could do
With this rusty set of tools
And if our patient is untrue
We'll pull the plug on certain doom

All those things that just won't move
Through passion's misuse
A statement so cruel (so, so cruel)
Self-pity in bloom

And on that corner of the picture
Behind the webs and shades of light
Concentric frames sought-after
This distance is a higher art

trackinfo.title: The Familiar Sex
trackinfo.lyrics:
Post-orgasmic intrusive thoughts
And what do they mean
First you learn what you must
Then the therapists seal the deal

An endless falling  
A sudden nakedness
Streets rearranging
The familiar sex

Speculation like burning moths
The dots just aren't there
Universal take on lust
Children at both ends

trackinfo.title: New Year Ghost
trackinfo.lyrics:
He said relax
Have a smoke
You handsome man
My pretty whore

You like the taste
You sit on top
You handsome waste
You're on your own

trackinfo.title: ABC
trackinfo.lyrics:
The pair he saw
The zip below
He walks through doors
Your laughingstock

Some dare to ask
Who's got the what
He's not that kind
An open heart

And in the soft core of his visions
He's choking on this mission
You talk to him
With just winks

trackinfo.title: Pop Song 21
trackinfo.lyrics:
And every vermin in the book
I put it in my mouth
Erratic scars and warts
The swollen glands of god

My bleeding gums
My festered core
My splintered smile
My reign of pus
This abscess life
Obsessed with bile
A bowel nightmare
Of my own

A gluey membrane on my eyes
Acidic seizure trip
Synaptic coup d'état
Intestinal homage

trackinfo.title: False Start
trackinfo.lyrics:
Blocks
I was
Not the one
Not far away

Cut
Wish
Dry
Sense

False start
False end

High
Slave
Don't
Say

Blocks
I was
Not the one
Not far away

False start

trackinfo.title: False Start II
trackinfo.lyrics:
Thoughts inside thoughts inside nothing
Crafting our tales with the appropriate brush
The leading roles are all taken
And it seems a little crowded at the back

They got the idea
Experts on maps
Argued for years
The low end of math

And when the sun stops burning
And the cracks grow wide
Are you on our side?

A remnant of the flesh
We used to wear
Cover your eyes

The writer says it's all in your head
Believe in nothing that I say
The pieces hardly put together
The poem that no one seems to understand

A plausible scam
They shoot for the stars
A shower of petals
The most blinding light

trackinfo.title: The Fan
trackinfo.lyrics:
And it must feel nice
To know such things
To rise above
And conquer fear

It must be something else
To not crumble away
Under the weight
Of every single stare

If this is love or hate, who cares?
Admiration or a cross to bear
Tempted to a higher state
A crown of thorns in hell

Cheating Spouses Caught On Tape.about: Fragments of stories and pieces of bad advice set to industrial beats

trackinfo.title: I'm Impressed by Your Feelings
trackinfo.lyrics:
Of course I know
I've been everywhere
Seen everything
My experience is universal
And my conclusions are thoughtful
And righteous
But don't quote me on that

trackinfo.title: Sometimes the Tip Comes Out with a Little Blood On It
trackinfo.lyrics:
This is a lie
We are not here
Blueprints for nightmares
My mother has a sting
I am the poison she created
It's all about the wound
Don't let my moaning fool you
I am a saint
Naked and yearning for a crucifixion
Rapture comes in spurts

trackinfo.title: Free Jazz All Over my Face
trackinfo.lyrics:
Clean your act
Push them down the stairs
I breathe cyanide wings
Forgetful forgiveness
I keep this pills just in case
Mud on the lungs is a gift from heaven
The next hour
Was the worst song
And you fail for the first time

trackinfo.title: A Man of Few Words
trackinfo.lyrics:
Day one: scratch 'till you bleed
Day two: the sourness of tolerance
Day three: I'm up for anything
Day four: as long as it is dangerous
Day five: a glitch on the dance floor
Day six: give me what I want
Day seven: daddy's birthday!
Day eight: repeat the last sentence
Day one: my dearly beloved
Day two: fuck taxing, let's decapitate
Day three: he was a man of few words
Day four: all lies
Day five: oh, my futuristic fetish
Day six: peak of anxiety
Day seven: how could they?
Day eight: I think I'll have a spiritual awakening

trackinfo.title: Slave to the Grindr
trackinfo.lyrics:
Late night hunting for nothing
Spasm and smell
Like a new friend
And a mask made of clay
I become the word
A one-eyed old lady
Laughing through the flames
Screaming horror poetry
In execution labs

trackinfo.title: The Problem with Intensity
trackinfo.lyrics:
The horror nesting on my chest
Fractured recordings of a pounding heartbeat
A screeching high frequency piercing the skin
The dark glowing on your bones
In love with carbon monoxide
I'm anointed
A slug with a crown of salt
Crawling and crying all over this meat
The flies, they never left

trackinfo.title: Horatio and Abdul
trackinfo.lyrics:
What insects do when they sense danger
A blink, almost mechanical
Some resemblance
Something to cry for
And the lines, they go forever
What was your picture of the future?
Author unknown
Enough syllables for a healthy meal
And a trip to the floor

trackinfo.title: The Proper Use of Obscure and Cool References
trackinfo.lyrics:
This is not working
Sounds falling nowhere
Like a rat in a maze
Misguided by a familiar voice
The shapes we drew when we were blind
All in black and white
Such a well performed drama
Not one limb intact

trackinfo.title: High on Media-Fueled Paranoia and Sugar
trackinfo.lyrics:
Lips on bricks
A ritual initiation
Crying manifestos into the flames
Borders traced in ash
Political innuendo is lover under will
Our place dissolves
A steady diet of bleach
Becoming vulture and hammer
And buckets full of gore
High on media-fueled paranoia and weed
Feeding on everything
Perspective be damned

trackinfo.title: History
trackinfo.lyrics: Type your text here

trackinfo.title: Leech
trackinfo.lyrics:
A barren field
Freezing cold void
The aching urge
For nothing at all

trackinfo.title: Bones
trackinfo.lyrics: Steal my body home

trackinfo.title: Fairy
trackinfo.lyrics:
Saints are blank pages
And sooner or later we all confess
Sooner or later
Sooner

trackinfo.title: Slogan
trackinfo.lyrics:
No of them knew they were robots
Superstar

trackinfo.title: Maze
trackinfo.lyrics:
On fear alone
I must admit
Through fractured visions
Away

trackinfo.title: Stroke
trackinfo.lyrics:
Restless
Shakes on the stomach and hours frozen
Time undefined
And yet so final

trackinfo.title: Shut Down
trackinfo.lyrics: What do you think of my new speech generator?

trackinfo.title: You'll end up alone and lost inside your own mind, just like him
I miss the comfort of being sad

Cheating Spouses Caught On Tape.title: Out (Queerviolence Vol. II)
Cheating Spouses Caught On Tape.about: So, you say you like it rough.

trackinfo.title: The Lonely Fag
trackinfo.lyrics:
Stay away
I've been hurt
Graveyard care
Crack and divide

These flowers
They change their color
Under the moonlight

trackinfo.title: My Clichés are Better than Yours
trackinfo.lyrics:
Sad and anxious
A cum slut
Behind shadows
Last laugh

trackinfo.title: Discarded and Invisible
trackinfo.lyrics:
There are no words
Almost a name
Oblivion refuge
The harshest shade of silence
And a couple of t-shirts

trackinfo.title: Peer Pressure Activism
trackinfo.lyrics:
You draw the circle
We'll use our bones as a wall

trackinfo.title: Difficult Personality, Hard to Love
trackinfo.lyrics:
That perfect smile
That charming carelessness

Home is where the hurt is
Am I beautiful enough for you?

trackinfo.title: Codified Rituals of Exclusion and Shame
trackinfo.lyrics:
Metallic dark grey as far as the eye can see
A perfect monolith
Crush, my sweet monster
We've got your back

trackinfo.title: The Collective, The Individual and the Fucked-Upness of It All
trackinfo.lyrics:
Pushing and shoving
This dance's a mess
Eyeball orthodontics
Excremental poetry

trackinfo.title: All Talk and No Walk Makes Jack a Crappy Friend
trackinfo.lyrics:
It's red, sometimes pitch black
It's in our teeth
It's when they send the roses back
It's been weeks

trackinfo.title: Anniversary of Your First Suicide Attempt
trackinfo.lyrics:
Freezing circles on the back of the neck
Eyes closed, almost submerged
A tunnel of robotic stares
Something feels off

trackinfo.title: Buried Somewhere Under the Rainbow
trackinfo.lyrics: They do still owe us a living

trackinfo.title: Cops with Crazy Hair and Shiny Piercings
trackinfo.lyrics:
I've seen the wires
And it's just sad really
I could be wrong
Maybe just prejudiced

But it's curious
How that interest
That suspicion
Is always there

trackinfo.title: No One is Essential, They Said
trackinfo.lyrics:
Was this time comedy or tragedy?
Not all flags, right
Sometimes I forget
Even the most basic things

trackinfo.title: Casualties of the Shade War
trackinfo.lyrics:
Stuck in a timeless void
Ripped-out organs as currency
Stylish butchers are never wrong
A drink of solvent and a shower of boiling oil

trackinfo.title: Boring
trackinfo.lyrics:
Someone is documenting and classifying 
Every single conversation that was ever had

And it's to die for

trackinfo.title: Pink Capitalism Smells just as Shitty
trackinfo.lyrics:
I'm shaking, why aren't you?
I'm frightened, why aren't' you?

Opposite triggers
It's hard to see in this fog

trackinfo.title: Planned Obsolescence
trackinfo.lyrics:
Silver is for those we deem as desirable
The rest of you are just gray
You once told me queer people don't age
This heart attack disagrees

trackinfo.title: Presumptuous and Full of Self-Pity
trackinfo.lyrics:
Some mirrors hurt more than others
I crawl inside to lick my wounds
I feast on my shortcomings
There's a point in this
A point I think I often miss

trackinfo.title: Just the Same as You
trackinfo.lyrics:
Selfish
Conceited
Coward
Broken
Destructive
Piece of shit

trackinfo.title: No Fats, No Oldies
trackinfo.lyrics:
There is nothing new about this world
And I'm tired of aching all the time

Embracing the artifice and its density. 

Nothing is resolved, no wisdom is gained. 



Una historia opaca de frustración, inmadurez política y deseos impuros.

Abrazando el artificio y su densidad.

Nada se resuelve, ninguna sabiduría es adquirida.

released August 31, 2017
            
            All songs by CSCOT except "Night Goat" by (the) Melvins.

trackinfo.title: So
trackinfo.lyrics:
it all comes crushing down
the final act

trackinfo.title: Texts for Nothing
trackinfo.lyrics:
it stinks of death in here
running in circles for years
delusions of language
just carnage, gore and fear
the explanations failed
the words never been heard
strength in numbers
the cycle celebrates itself
impossibility
the human stage
slowly dissolving
in blinding grey

trackinfo.title: Neither
trackinfo.lyrics:
there were days ahead
so much more than we could take
safe and warm
in this place we can fade away
hiding in plain sight
shadows and fractured smiles
sandpaper discretion
mysterious and numb

trackinfo.title: Eleutheria
trackinfo.lyrics:
promises unkept
a disease that spreads
cracking skin
secret journal of sin
buried

trackinfo.title: Last Tape
trackinfo.lyrics:
protected by absence
a silence too dense
cells inside cells inside cells
we march relentless
a token of faith
and no one is here to play our game
the clock keeps ticking
a debt unpaid
a swarm of grudges and contempt
we hate each other
and we should

trackinfo.title: Waiting
trackinfo.lyrics:
a barren field
freezing cold void
the aching urge
for nothing at all
and in this cage
not a single soul
who cares enough
to stop our fall
these arms
they don't reach
the distant noise
of muffled fear

trackinfo.title: The Unnamable
trackinfo.lyrics:
restless
shakes on the stomach and hours frozen
time undefined
and yet so final
never is the proper 
unit of measurement
standing forever 
in the same place
the less dramatic
of all tragedies
no purpose
no predictable trajectory

trackinfo.title: The Expelled
trackinfo.lyrics:
he's laying the cards on the table
and it's just blank papers
there are delusions and half truths
to keep him wrapped up for a while
there's rhetoric and semantics
and language as a hammer
clenched fists 
and repressed tears burning
regret dripping through every pore
of this tainted meat
the wrong bones 
and ten tons of denial
with nothing to show for
might as well be invisible

trackinfo.title: Endgame
trackinfo.lyrics:
one grey window
one closed door
one last tear
before I go
an escape
in black and white
the silent film
falls apart
dreams and wishes
a speck of dust
resting shoulders
on endless walls

Cheating Spouses Caught On Tape.about: Useless soundtrack for hours of unironic self-loathing.

The Most Noxious Culture in the History of the World
Some Sad European Movie About the Harshest Realities of Capitalism or Something

Cheating Spouses Caught On Tape.title: Your Emotions Make You a Monster (The Dubious Autobiography of a Drama Queen)
Cheating Spouses Caught On Tape.about:
These songs are the map of a territory that no one cared to explore.



And it's cheaper than therapy.

trackinfo.title: Chapter I: These Words are Where I Hide but These Sounds are Full Frontal Nudity
Chapter II: Things I Never Learned How To Do, Part 1: Asking for Help

trackinfo.title: The Writer of Clever Phrases Is a Sad, Sad Person
trackinfo.lyrics:
The rope, it suits you
Tomorrow, not so much
This shit is genius
Who's really reading who?
Is the joke on me?

trackinfo.title: Sorry, I Can't Hear You from my Moral Pedestal
trackinfo.lyrics:
It's not my fault that your clock is broken
The scope, the nuances
The complex maze of these streets
The chaotic web of lines that draw this impenetrable void

trackinfo.title: How Mainstream Gay Porn Ruined My Life
trackinfo.lyrics:
Harsh
Skin on skin, hard, almost raw flesh
This goes way beyond confusion
This is a surrender
Sealed with a tear

trackinfo.title: The Incesant Piling Up Of Unresolved Issues Leading to This All-encompassing  Emotional Numbness
trackinfo.lyrics:
That first touch
Unwanted
A seed, maybe?
That first hit
The first of many more
To come
Innocence, I can't remember
Not sure that I care
This trail, I can't follow back
Wrists severed, hips destroyed
Softness turned inside out
The first and last defeat
The regret of a lifetime building momentum

trackinfo.title: Against Symmetry and Consonance
trackinfo.lyrics:
Bones are meaningless
But they can make beautiful sculptures
Words are forbidden
The broken prism of the law
A bouquet of lung cancer
Buried monuments to everything and nothing

trackinfo.title: The Glorious Butchering of Walter J. Freeman II
trackinfo.lyrics:
Eyes shut
Burning red skin
Tools of the trade
Not a spot left unsupervised
This should hurt everywhere

trackinfo.title: I've Become Axl Swimming with the Dolphins
trackinfo.lyrics:
I call this one: Pot and Loneliness in B minor
Don't laugh at my masterpiece

trackinfo.title: CSCOT Is Fucking Dead
trackinfo.lyrics:
A song to press my tongue against your boot
I'm all used up and broken
But I can get down for one last beating
Let's wait and see how long does it takes
Until I cry wolf again

Cheating Spouses Caught On Tape.title: Greatest Hits Vol. II

trackinfo.title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

Cheating Spouses Caught On Tape.title: Softcore
Cheating Spouses Caught On Tape.about:
Heart of the cyborg.

The musical is also political.

trackinfo.title: Sometimes a Cool Reference Is Not Enough
trackinfo.lyrics:
Calm. 
No words. 
Cut the lines surgically. 
Open the gates. 
Flood. 
Repeat. 
Chainsaw. 
Knife. 
Not playing by the book. 
Eating the book. 

But the other ones were much worst. 
I can sympathize but I won't. 
This was never meant to be a church. 

It crept slowly into our bone marrow. 
The disguise, the design. 
All dressed in shiny colors and beautiful thorns. 
Too far from perfect to be suspicious. 
Cynical.
 An impulse, almost.

trackinfo.title: The Land of the Pointless
trackinfo.lyrics:
I'll remove myself.

All those broken theories. 
It might be just what we were waiting for.

trackinfo.title: Nobody Warned Me that Life Was High School Repeating Itself In a Neverending Loop of Bullying
trackinfo.lyrics:
Shield your ears. 
Fail the test. 
Walk through this minefield. 
Dread each step. 

Hear. 
Every single thing.

There is no advice. 
Frown harder. 
Eyes on the side.

trackinfo.title: Lack of Insight Excuse Your Transphobic Behavior Does Not (Only a Cis Deals in Absolutes)
trackinfo.lyrics:
Foul dreams and shivers.
Except my own.
A heirloom on the floor.

And the things that were given, they must be so important to you.
And it's obvious that all the implications never crossed your mind.

Around the seams.
Wired rope.
Typecast in fading gray. 

So, here's what I think: 
We need to climb real high, our fall must be the hardest or nothing at all.

trackinfo.title: The Sensitive Indie Asshole (And His Best Buddy, The Misogynist Hardcore Nerd)
trackinfo.lyrics:
Cast a useless spell and dream away your chances. 
Tainted. 
Just as everything else. 

And then we don't move. 
A rhetorical maze. 
Are you lost yet? 

To some it's just a game, so they always end up winning. 
The rest of us bleed as our screams are dismissed as a childish tantrum. 

A hammer to crack all words written in stone.

trackinfo.title: It's Not a Contradiction if You can Turn It into Art
trackinfo.lyrics:
Peel everything, expose nothing. 
This is our stench. 
Turn the flesh inside out only to reveal
( the outside in disguise). 

Go. 
Turn away. 
Reject. 
Far away.

It's my rack and I'll stay here for as long as needed. 
Do you want to know something? 
Like our fear.

Recruit yourself old.
Smash that wretched thing. 
You know I won't pass judgment. 
At least not in public.

trackinfo.title: I'm Not Sure that You Can Re-Signify That
trackinfo.lyrics:
Words stolen from liars. 
These final moments are just a global mindfuck. 
Electricity on the wrong hands. 

Words never spoken. 
Understood. 
The blinding vast whiteness numbing the senses. 

All those images. 
The movement, the rhythm.

This invisible dance. 
Smoke. 
Lights clouding the sight. 
Maybe it's just a failed connection. 
Maybe it's real. 
Maybe we'll never know.

trackinfo.title: Of Productivity, Sex and Scissors
trackinfo.lyrics:
Wear this rust like the blood of Christ on your tongue. 
Paint my skin with ash and brimstone. 

Muscle. 
Flex. 
Bend. 
Lie. 
Down. 

Broken spines, tearful eyes and a box of matches. 
Let me be a worm. 

I'm scared. 
A Blade. 
Something. 
This.

trackinfo.title: Like I Don't Know That I'm Pathetic
trackinfo.lyrics:
Nobody slips on these walls.
We hold a solipsistic sort of hope.

Nod to the sleep of sweet fires.
One day they'll save another world.

Traits. 
Flavors. 
Unbreakable trajectories.

trackinfo.title: Just a Skeleton (Tales of The Outside, The Inside and The Lack of Meaning)
trackinfo.lyrics:
Weakness and strength I cannot understand. 
I'll say the opposite every time. 
Not here. 
I'd say that we'll have time but we both know that's a lie. 
I am the daughter of spasms and strained joints.

Don't run. 
Out in the open with a knife between my teeth. 
Bleeding gums and all. 
Doubt. 
Like hell. 
Like a rope.

In a complicated relationship with a drill. 
We can take what we want. 
The numbers are on our side. 

A network too dense to notice and impossible to escape. 
Are we choking yet? 
The answers seem blurred and yet so clear. 
The most frightening vision. 

It's so crowded here no one will notice until it's too late. 
In a heartbeat they'll cut our throats and drink our blood. 
And we can't blame them but we'll try to anyway.

trackinfo.lyrics: I'm all dressed up and ready to go. Hornier than romantic. Awkward and somehow cute, I guess. Silent anyway, whether speaking or not.

trackinfo.title: Daddy, Am I a Masochist? (Spanking the Bad Girl Blues)
trackinfo.lyrics: Embrace rejection. Be one. Ready to explode at any time. Smile. Always. Smile.

trackinfo.title: Come As Your Madness
trackinfo.lyrics: Doors are also lines. Patterns and prayers flowing as one. Force the pieces in almost perfect symmetry. Sing and rejoice. We're ready. We're properly dressed. If we laugh, why can't you?

trackinfo.title: So What If I don't Have a Name for What I Am Right Now Sexually Speaking
trackinfo.lyrics: He's angry and scared. She wants to tell the truth. They both hear the same voices. They seem to be obsessing over obsession. But they will be fine.

trackinfo.title: MasturbatriXXXL (Mariana Cordoba's Song)
trackinfo.lyrics: Yes.

trackinfo.title: Pansexual Show at Channel 13
trackinfo.lyrics: You think this is easy for me. Not knowing what you're thinking. Knowing is harder. Maybe. I'll stop writing when you say so. Consider this another thing unsaid.

trackinfo.title: Suicide Is Also a Way Of Reclaiming Power
trackinfo.lyrics: So hard to focus through rainy windows. I'll always be going back and forth with these thoughts. I'm sorry. It's only bones, you know? Showmanship and happy songs. More coffee, please.

trackinfo.title: Suck a Dick
trackinfo.lyrics: I don't hate you. I don't think I hate you. I'm just confused. And angry. And sad. I think you'll love it. Do you want me to turn the volume down? Oxygen is overrated. Sweet dreams.

trackinfo.title: Tired of Those Leather Daddies on Steroids (A Suite Against Closeted Fascists)
trackinfo.lyrics: Here we are now, entertain us. Sleazy and wrong. Greetings. Broken teeth. Blood-drenched lips. Look outside. Now look inside. Now look again. Now do what you want.

trackinfo.title: And Finally I Came to the Overwhelming Realization That Almost None of my Thoughts Were Mine
trackinfo.lyrics: Movies are bullshit. None of them are real. Times ten. I understand. I am scared too.

trackinfo.title: Why Can't We Consider Onanism/Voyeurism a Proper Sexual Orientation?
trackinfo.lyrics: The neck. Armed and dangerous. Maybe an excuse but who are you to judge? Climax. Repeat. You can be somehow free. Stop. Climax. Repeat. One less. Wear women clothes. Stop. Climax. Repeat.

trackinfo.title: Self-Pity is Such a Turn-On

trackinfo.title: White, Skinny, Handsome People Don't Know Shit About What It Is Like to Live Under Fascist Beauty Standards (Or There Is No Such Thing as Alternative Models)

trackinfo.title: In What Turns Out to Be a Disappointing (To Say the Least) Encounter, Character “A” meets Characters “B” and “C” while Her Mother tries pointlessly to Contact her on the Phone

Introducing Characters “D” through “G”, who, along with Characters “B and “C” (And with the Aid of What We Will Call “Other Accomplices”) lead Interesting Lives doing Things to Characters like Character “A” that no Human Being should do to anyone
Trapped in the Worst of Situations, Character “A” stops Trying to Understand the World and Carves Indelible Postcards of the Darker and Most Chaotic Side of the Human Condition in Her Mind
Indeed, the Outside World just doesn’t Make Any Sense Anymore, Insects and Indescribable Creatures (such as Characters “B” through “G” and “Other Accomplices”) have Taken Over and No One Is Safe
Missing Scenes, Flashes of Red Light, Sweaty Fragments of Bodies Collapsing, Flesh Clashing on Flesh, Sculpting Impassable and Definitive Roads on What Once Was Soft Skin
Character “B” Reveals Himself as a Leader of Sorts, Claiming for Himself a Kingdom of Cowardice and Abuse that, He Knows (We All Know by Now), No One Will Dare to Try and Take Away From Him
We sit back like they taught us. We keep quiet like they taught us. We play the roles that they assigned us. We blame her for being there. But we are all here. We're all... guilty

Charles Bukowski: Vocals on "June 9th".

trackinfo.title: January 18th
trackinfo.lyrics: This chloroform dream keeps waiting for me. A note from a scream says “I want the whole thing”. Too indisposed to cut the wire, I breathe before I see. Another tongue it’s getting higher. I should have felt them coming for me. This stench is fierce. This stench is real. I sleep on hard wrists while I travel in heat.

trackinfo.title: February 8th
trackinfo.lyrics: It's a world of multiple obsessions and not all of them are mine. Several sides to witness the mysterious and none of them apply. Hey, Mistress of error, can you spear my time? Hey, Mister Bold Verbose, will you close my eyes? This is the part where I cross through the night with ghosts by my side. Two of them scratching my spine in an indecent reply. It won't be enough. I guess it never is. You pointed out without doubt the problem with me. If we never shake hands that would be so weird. Purpose and regret I trace within my head.

trackinfo.title: March 8th
trackinfo.lyrics: We serve as the air runs wild. This hospital bed is one of a kind. Screaming out lullabies with tired throats and broken lungs. Should I go back to sleep? The flames are flying higher. We hardly can see through all the smoke. Our backs tied real tight. Won’t dare to say another word. Should I go back to sleep? Ideas and knives left behind. Not a single ounce to call our own. We wonder about the night. When did we realize our world was gone? Should I go back to sleep?

trackinfo.title: April 1st
trackinfo.lyrics: Boots and tongues hanging from red-winged trees. The smell of fire dissipating in a fog of vomit. Moving through this space where art is high and low at the same time. Perspective is a wall of mud fragmenting itself into blurred pictures of fate. These animals are not meant to be calmed down. On the other hand, their lives tend to be rather short. Concentric shells aim at gestures of confrontation. This molecular warfare is forever lost.

trackinfo.title: May 27th
trackinfo.lyrics: "We should talk", He said. "I don't feel like talking right now", I replied. "You never feel like talking". He's right.

trackinfo.title: June 9th
trackinfo.lyrics: “Their finest art” by Charles Bukowski.

trackinfo.title: July 25th
trackinfo.lyrics: If this is hair, what's in my mind? I shaved my head to reach inside. I've read the books and learned the stars. Undressed my soul with loaded guns. I am evil master plan. With empty hands I came to town. I drenched my back in boiling tar. A spectacle to lift the hearts. I'll fake my death for the last time. I am evil master plan.

trackinfo.title: August 16th
trackinfo.lyrics: She's sitting on top of the city. She lights another cigarette. Her arms all twisted and heavy. I bet you couldn't even see her. Make up on the inside. You'll never know where it came from. She never asked to be born. Her time impossible to measure. She's right, if there's a right or wrong. She'll take what's hers and more. Her eyes on ours. Scared to death of what they'll show us.

trackinfo.title: September 13th
trackinfo.lyrics: Bitter as the fourth best, I step on my steps. Trapped in what your eyes have deemed as unreal. This clash of words means nothing as long as I don’t win. Touch the plastic ceiling. Dusty signs of fear. The wretched and the soon to be. Their courtship is plain sick. Do you remember soft skin? Hands gone wild on secret tricks. Signals falling from your mouth. Trick or treat. Secretly I raise the bar as far as I can see.

trackinfo.title: October 24th
trackinfo.lyrics: To stay awake, I must admit, I am never awake. On fear alone I feast my own through fractured visions of gold. Uncomfortable silence. Our daze of hate, the perfect game. I can almost explain. Uncomfortable silence.

trackinfo.title: November 15th
trackinfo.lyrics: Trying to make sense of this I peeled off some skin. I thought I could find the right metaphors there but I was wrong. I found concealed ugliness, old wounds never properly healed and a book full of suicide notes. But no decent literature.

trackinfo.title: December 15th
trackinfo.lyrics: It’s not your heart that I want. The hidden knots of misplaced love. Though I am not the one to judge, this frame of mind seems obvious. The myth, the vote, the holy ghost. We’ve seen the remnants of it all. They gave us some to seize our hope. We settled for a few old crumbs.

Cheating Spouses Caught On Tape.title: Proud to Commit Heterosexual Suicide
Cheating Spouses Caught On Tape.about: Música de glande con glande, de clítoris con clítoris, de pan con pan, que no es ninguna comida de zonzos. Música de puños en el culo, de dildos inquietos y guantes de látex negros. Música con sabor a semen, saliva, flujo vaginal, sangre, sudor y lágrimas. Música para maricas, tortas, travas, mutantes, culorrotos, machonas, impotentes, frígidas, indefinidos, putas, soplanucas, pajeros, histéricas, asexuados y fetichistas. Música hecha sin el más mínimo reparo por aquello que se considere "natural", construida sobre sonidos en estado de desviación constante y artificios genéricos deconstruidos y vueltos a erigir en collages de absoluta y dichosa deformidad.

Cheating Spouses Caught On Tape.title: Urban Sombrero
Cheating Spouses Caught On Tape.about:
Si “Urban Sombrero” fuese un jugador de fútbol retirado, sería Antonio Alzamendi. Si fuera una especie de onomatopeya sin sentido inventada por Raúl Portal, sería Mboheio. Y, si fuera un fenómeno lamentable, sería la cantidad de marxistas que realmente creen que el kirchnerismo (¿lo qué?) es un movimiento de izquierda.

En otras palabras, “U.S.” (un homenaje a la mejor cultura del mundo, la norteamericana) es un disco que, más allá de sus méritos musicales (o falta de ellos), sirve a propósitos específicos tendientes a mejorar la vida cotidiana del escucha. A través de su cuidadoso tratamiento sonoro, estas piezas estimulan, de forma subliminal e imperceptible, ciertas zonas del cerebro que...bueno, si les digo cuáles son se perdería la sorpresa. 

Sólo puedo decir que, desde cierto punto de vista, este cuarto disco de Cheating Spouses Caught On Tape podría ser acusado de ejercicio ilegal de la medicina.
